title: Miscrits & Relics adjustments
intro: Patch focuses on fine-tuning ability scaling, utility, and stat distribution across multiple Miscrits. This update targets outliers in sustain, damage-over-time pressure, and stat stacking, while also introducing several ability reworks and utility shifts to improve combat clarity and strategic diversity. Overall, these changes aim to create healthier trade-offs between damage, control, and survivability across both PvE and PvP encounters

changes.label: Resplendent Rain
changes.from: Storm
changes.to: A 25 AP Water attack that raises your Elemental Attack by 10, with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)

changes.label: Tears of Adinda
changes.from: Heals yourself by 10 HP and raises your Accuracy by 5%, with 110% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 Heal)
changes.to: Cleanses user and heals yourself by 25 HP (2 turns cooldown), with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)

changes.label: Dream Catcher
changes.from: A 34 AP Lightning attack that provides 8 Block and raises your Elemental Attack by 8, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 34 AP Lightning attack that provides 10 Block and raises your Elemental Attack by 8, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)

changes.label: Voltage
changes.from: Voltage
changes.to: Plasma Pulse

changes.label: Krakyn Klaw
changes.from: A 30 AP Physical attack that steals 8 Defenses from foe, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)
changes.to: A 30 AP Physical attack that steals 10 Defenses from foe, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)

changes.label: Tentacle Trench
changes.from: A 33 AP Water attack that inflicts Bleed and Anti-heal for 3 turns, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 34 AP Water attack that inflicts Bleed and Anti-heal for 3 turns, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)

changes.label: OverWater
changes.from: OverWater
changes.to: Whirlpool

changes.label: Mush
changes.from: Mush
changes.to: OverWater

changes.label: Dark Tainted Flame
changes.from: A 33 AP Fire attack that inflicts 8 AP Poison for 3 turns, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 33 AP Fire attack that inflicts 9 AP Poison for 3 turns, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)

changes.label: Blighted Ferocity
changes.from: A 48 AP Physical attack (2 turns cooldown), with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 AP)
changes.to: A 48 AP Physical attack that steals 10 Elemental Attack from foe (2 turns cooldown), with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 AP)

changes.label: Blighted Leaves
changes.from: A 25 AP Nature attack that raises your Physical Attack by 12, with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 25 AP Nature attack that heals yourself by 15 HP, with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)

changes.label: Unbreakable
changes.from: Unbreakable
changes.to: Thrash

changes.label: Gilly Weed
changes.from: Gilly Weed
changes.to: Unbreakable

changes.label: Claw
changes.from: Claw
changes.to: Gilly Weed

changes.label: Mother's Instinct
changes.from: A 30 AP Physical attack that raises your Attacks and Defenses by 5, with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 30 AP Physical attack that raises your Attacks and Defenses by 6, with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)

changes.label: Origin
changes.from: A 25 AP Lightning attack that raises your Attacks and Defenses by 5, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 AP)
changes.to: A 25 AP Lightning attack that raises your Attacks and Defenses by 6, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 AP)

changes.label: Foil Panda Bash
changes.from: A 29 AP Nature attack that inflicts Anti-heal for 3 turns and raises your Elemental Attack by 8, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)
changes.to: A 29 AP Nature attack that inflicts Anti-heal for 3 turns and raises your Elemental Attack by 10, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)

changes.label: Coral Tempest
changes.from: A 30 AP Wind attack that grants 9 healing for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +2 AP)
changes.to: A 30 AP Wind attack that grants 10 healing for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +2 AP)

changes.label: Mighty Winds
changes.from: A 29 AP Wind attack that inflicts 8 AP Fire DoT for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)
changes.to: A 29 AP Wind attack that inflicts 7 AP Fire DoT for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)

changes.label: Brimstone
changes.from: Brimstone
changes.to: Passion

changes.label: Wailing Wind
changes.from: A 16 AP Wind attack that hits 2 times and inflicts 10 AP Poison for 3 turns, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 15 AP Wind attack that hits 2 times and inflicts 10 AP Poison for 3 turns, with 95% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5% Accuracy)

changes.label: Hard Lock
changes.from: Paralyzes your foe for 4 turns (1 Use), with --% Accuracy (Enchanted | Replenishes 5 Health)
changes.to: Paralyzes your foe for 4 turns and raises your Physical Defense by 10 (1 Use), with --% Accuracy (Enchanted | Replenishes 5 Health)

changes.label: Tainted Flame
changes.from: A 25 AP Fire attack that inflicts 6 AP Poison for 3 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +4 AP)
changes.to: A 25 AP Fire attack that inflicts 7 AP Poison for 3 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +4 AP)

changes.label: Reap
changes.from: Reap
changes.to: Sow

changes.label: Eclipse
changes.from: A 30 AP Wind attack that inflicts Bleed for 4 turns and Anti-heal for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)
changes.to: A 30 AP Wind attack that inflicts Bleed for 3 turns and Anti-heal for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)

changes.label: Brainy Bolts
changes.from: A 30 AP Lightning attack that steals 12 HP from foe (2 turns cooldown), with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 AP)
changes.to: A 30 AP Lightning attack that steals 11 HP from foe (2 turns cooldown), with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +5 AP)

changes.label: Monster Knuckle
changes.from: A 29 AP Physical attack that inflicts Switch Curse (2 turns cooldown), with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)
changes.to: A 28 AP Physical attack that inflicts Switch Curse (2 turns cooldown), with 90% Accuracy (Enchanted | +10% Accuracy)

changes.from: A 27 AP Physical attack that inflicts 7 AP Physical DoT for 3 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)
changes.to: A 27 AP Physical attack that inflicts 7 AP Physical DoT for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +3 AP)

changes.label: Poison Mauler
changes.from: A 28 AP Physical attack that inflicts 7 AP Physical DoT for 3 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +2 AP)
changes.to: A 28 AP Physical attack that inflicts 7 AP Physical DoT for 2 turns, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +2 AP)

changes.label: Cry of the Tiger
changes.from: A 29 AP Physical attack that steals 10 HP from foe, with 100% Accuracy (Enchanted | +2 AP)

changes.label: Hoof Blast

changes.label: Mystic Map
changes.from: +8 HP, +8 EA, -10 SPD
changes.to: +9 HP, +9 EA, -10 SPD
